sentences.en: From above , a feasible evaluation system for sugarcane smut resistance was established.
sentences.cn: 本文建立的甘蔗品种抗黑穗病评价体系是切实可行的.

sentences.en: Here comes the smut, Martha. Dad is drunk and cursing heaven again.
sentences.cn: 玛莎, 脏话出来了. 爸醉了,又在诅咒老天爷.

sentences.en: His illness was diagnosed as smut.
Maize inbred line Ji853 from Huangzaosi groups was improved by Dan340, and selected excellent line cultivars Jin01 and Jin02 that with high combining ability and head smut-resistance.
sentences.cn: 利用丹340改良了黄早四类群玉米自交系吉853，育成配合力高、抗丝黑穗病的优良自交系津01和津02。

sentences.en: Scientists want to investigate the relation between xerophthalmia occurrence and smut contiguity.
sentences.cn: 科学家们打算探讨干眼症与煤尘接触之间的关系.

sentences.en: Six varieties were compared on incidence, severity and loss rate of false smut of rice ( FSR ).
sentences.cn: 采用6个对稻曲病抗感程度不同的水稻品种 ( 组合 ),调查稻曲病发病率 、 严重度并计算损失率.

sentences.en: The relationship of soil temperature, soil humidity, seeding time and occurrence of maize smut were studied.
sentences.cn: 试验主要研究土壤温度 、 湿度及播种期与玉米丝黑病发生的关系.

sentences.en: The tabloid papers are full of smut.
sentences.cn: 这些小报充斥着下流的东西.

sentences.en: There is a smut dealer just near the high school.
sentences.cn: 在那所高中附近,有个卖黄色书刊的人.

sentences.en: There is smut on the windows.
Using false smut rice ( FSR ) sclerotia isolation, the pathogen of FSR was cultured in PSA medium.
sentences.cn: 在PSA培养基上,利用稻曲病菌菌核分离培养了稻曲病菌.

words.tran_cn: 猥亵的；弄脏的；害了黑穗病的
淫猥地；（被煤灰、尘埃等）弄脏地

trans.tran_cn: （一小块）污垢，煤烟，淫秽的书籍（故事，谈话等），（禾草、禾谷类的）黑粉病
